definition: tightfisted/stingy/short of money/hard up
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: The chance of meeting this person you are holding hands with now.
sentences.chinese: 能遇见身边这个被你的手紧拉住的人。

sentences.english: Dooku gripped the edge of the table. It was clear that a great surge of rage had overtaken him.
sentences.chinese: 杜库的手紧抓住桌子边沿，很明显他被激怒了。

sentences.english: Second - Hold on tight to the handle (if there is any).
